name: StartCloudShellSandbox
description: Start a CloudShell sandbox and make resources available in the pipeline
author: Quali
helpMarkDown: Start a sandbox and store the details in pipeline environment variables SandboxId and SandboxComponentsJSON

inputs.name: blueprintName
inputs.label: Blueprint Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the blueprint to use for the sandbox

inputs.name: blueprintInputs
inputs.label: Blueprint Inputs
inputs.helpMarkDown:
# Blueprint inputs, one per line

Example:

    Cloud Provider=AWS Oregon
    Count=5

inputs.name: sandboxName
inputs.label: Sandbox Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the sandbox. Leave blank to use the blueprint name.

inputs.name: durationMinutes
inputs.label: Duration in Minutes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of minutes before the sandbox should automatically end, if it is not ended later by this pipeline
